author: Darina Allen
method: Put all the ingredients except the oil and salt into the food processor.  Whiz for a second or two, add the oil and a little salt.  Taste and correct seasoning.
ingredients: 30g/1oz flatleaf parsley leaves (no stalks),  1-2 garlic cloves, crushed,  40g/1½oz freshly grated parmesan,  30g/1oz pine nuts,  75ml/2½fl oz extra virgin olive oil,  salt
